marklogic.body: I'm trying to guess how old you are. I think most people would assume you are quite young but I think there's more to it. No one develops the kind of bitterness and self loathing you exhibit without going through considerable emotional pain. I can only assume that you were abandoned, maybe by a parent or a loved one, maybe you experienced some personal loss, maybe a bereavement, but something happened to leave you so lonely and so insecure, desperately Reaching out for any sort of reaction to validate your miserable existence... I think a lot of people believe you're a repressed hom ose xual, I can understand their view, you certainly exhibit signs of some deep social Anxiety... part of me hopes that is the case because it would be tragic if you were simply an as sh ole. But I find that unlikely. I suspect you are just lonely and isolated and bored. I hope something goes right in your life and you find a way to move past this unfortunate phase in your life. Things do get better. People can change. I hope you find something that helps you develop a more fulfilling life.
